text: 1.17: Mal 3.1; 4.5-6; Mt 11.14; 17.11-13; Mk 9.12Ana vhɨra Iraiza Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaarar panan ŋkasŋkagi ŋkasŋkan farar muuŋgip fharav Fhe Bakɨme nɨman ŋgɨrga. Ana suaŋrim, ndegi taagip ndavi domdorɨv guigira wari won tari vuzvugɨrga. Ana mba bigi rɨɨrɨɨi gumgi, ana mbe suaŋrim, mbe taagip ndavi domdorɨp, mba tɨvir vhuuiŋ kaŋgiap, nta mbui gumgi ganɨv, ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ndiv, taagip bigi mbarararga.”
